body:
Hey all! It's nice to see what a great community avicus has. I would like to introduce myself, so you can get to know me better. Well, for starters, I love to help others out, in terms of difficulties, or a person that they can talk to. Secondly, I love to play with friends, both IRL and on the internet. The few years that I have been playing minecraft was great, meeting lots of wonderful people in different servers. But one day, I found avicus, typed in the server IP address, and bam, here I am today. 

So I hope to see you guys in the Avicus Server, take care! :)

title: My Introduction! - et477

replies.body: Welcome et477, hope to see you on! :)

replies.body: Welcome, I hope to see you in-game! :D

replies.body:
What's up et!

From what I've already seen of you, I can tell that you're gonna fit right in!

Here are the rules.
Read 'em up so you don't break anything expensive :P

If you have any questions, feel free to ask the communtiy or the staff.

The majority if not all of the staff are on Skype if you ever need anything or if you have any questions!

Welcome to Avicus man!
Hope to see you around soon!

replies.body:
Hello :)

Welcome to Avicus! Be sure to follow the rules at www.avicus.net/rules and you'll be fine. I hope you enjoy your stay, and if you have any questions, feel free to ask everyone, we will helo you out.
Cya around! :D
